description:
- STAGE - Stk_j migration from k to j stage
- am - amount of migration
- rate_init - migrated amount divided on total amount of portfolio in k stage at the start of year
- rate - migrated amount divided on annual average stage k portfolio
- am19, rate19 & rate_init19 - am, rate and rate_init in 2019 year

ST1, ST2, ST3, POCI, Total - reserve in percent for STAGE1, STAGE2, STAGE3, POCI & Total portfolio, respectvely
AM_ST1, AM_ST2, AM_ST3, AM_POCI, Total_AM - reserve in amount for STAGE1, STAGE2, STAGE3, POCI & Total portfolio, respectvely
